comment: @factcheckdotorg @blackrepublican What is the $25M to the Kennedy Center for exactly? Should the taxpayers be provided a detailed statement showing how/where EVERY single penny is being spent??

@EintheD1 @factcheckdotorg "As the nation's living memorial to President Kennedy, the Center receives federal funding each year to pay for capital repairs and maintenance of the buildings and grounds, a federal facility."https://t.co/OclRiBGlG7
